original_title: Two vehicles catch fire after head-on collision on Dehiwala flyover
original_body_lines: At least one person sustained burnt wounds after a three-wheeler and car collided head-on and caught fire on the Dehiwala flyover tonight.
The fire brigade team from Dehiwala had been dispatched to the scene after the incident was reported at around 8 p.m. today.
They said the driver of the three-wheeler was injured and was admitted to the Hospital.
Both vehicles were destroyed by the fire and heavy traffic was also reported in the area following the accident.(DSB)
